body: Good to see interstellar is still around. This isn’t my favorite work of theirs, but their strength has always been making longer doujins which truly encapsulate the sex itself, rather than a short, tantric few scenes. I also prefer their other works that have more girls; their best doujins are still ones like Choke, Submerge, or even older ones like Dissolve or Irresistible 4th—I think those make better use of their length. Either way, very excited to see more of Interstellar in the future, they’re a hidden gem and I hope they get more recognition soon!
